mapper.select: SELECT id, code, name, AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(rule),#{key}) AS rule, create_time AS createTime FROM tb_charge_rule WHERE `status` = 1 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT CAST(id AS CHAR) AS id, `code`, `name` FROM tb_charge_rule WHERE id = #{ruleId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_charge_rule SET code=#{code}, name = #{name}, rule= HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{rule},#{key})), `status`=#{status}
